title: [Health] A systematic review finds child abuse was associated with an increased risk of Adult Coronary Heart Disease. Adults with child abuse were associated with higher risk of CHD compared with those without (RR=1.52, 95% CI=1.29, 1.79).

[Health] New sound navigation technology enables the blind to navigate. Visual navigation areas in the brain can be activated using sound. By traversing mazes using sound information instead of visual information after training, visual navigation areas were activated.
